  • Method Details

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String uid, Map<String,Object> updates, FirebaseDB.OnUpdatedListener listener)
      Takes in a userId, a map of updates and a listener to update user information in firebase. Additonally updates the user's email and password in firebase authentication if those were updated as well.
      Parameters:
      uid - UserID of the specified user
      updates - Map of fields that are to be updated
      listener - Listener to keep track of updates

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String uid)
      Takes in a userID and fetches the user from Firebase, and returns as a user object.
      Parameters:
      uid - UserID of the specified user
      Returns:
      the user with the specified uid

    • getCurrentUserId

      public static String getCurrentUserId()

    • getAllUsers

      public void getAllUsers(FirebaseDB.OnUsersRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves all users from the "users" collection in Firestore. This method fetches all documents from the "users" collection in Firestore, converts each document into a User object, and adds it to a list. Once the retrieval is complete, the list of users is passed to the provided OnUsersRetrievedListener callback.
      Parameters:
      listener - A callback interface OnUsersRetrievedListener that is triggered once all users are retrieved, whether the task is successful or not.

    • searchUsers

      public void searchUsers(String search, FirebaseDB.OnUsersRetrievedListener listener)
      Searches for users in the "users" collection based on a given query.

      If the search query is empty, this method retrieves all users by calling getAllUsers(OnUsersRetrievedListener). Otherwise, it performs a Firestore query to find users whose names start with the given search string.

      Parameters:
      search - The search query string used to filter users by name.
      listener - A callback interface OnUsersRetrievedListener that is triggered once the search results are retrieved.

    • addMoodtoDB

      public void addMoodtoDB(Mood mood, String uid)
      Takes in a Mood object and the userID of the user that created the mood, and adds the mood to the database with the userID. Creates a unique moodID to track the mood.
      Parameters:
      mood - A mood object
      uid - The userID of the user that created the mood

    • updateMood

      public void updateMood(String moodID, Map<String,Object> updates, FirebaseDB.OnUpdatedListener listener)
      Updates and existing mood in firebase with the new mood information.
      Parameters:
      moodID - Unique ID of the mood to be updated
      updates - Map of the updates
      listener -

    • deleteMood

      public void deleteMood(Mood mood)
      Deletes the selected mood from firebase
      Parameters:
      mood - Specified mood to be deleted

    • getMoods

      public List<Mood> getMoods(String uid)
      Returns a list of moods created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique ID of the user whose moods are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Mood objects representing the user's moods.

    • updateMoodInDB

      public void updateMoodInDB(Mood mood)
      Updates the entire Mood document in Firestore using its moodID. Replaces the document with the latest Mood data.
      Parameters:
      mood - The Mood object with updated info (must include moodID)

    • addFollower

      public void addFollower(com.google.firebase.firestore.WriteBatch batch, @NonNull String followerID, @NonNull String followeeID)
      Adds a following relation to the database. Followee is the one being followed, follower is the one following
      Parameters:
      batch -
      followerID -
      followeeID -

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest(String currUserID, String requestedID)
      Sends a follow request from the current user to another user.

      This method updates two Firestore collections:

      • requests: Stores follow requests for each user. The document ID is the requested user's ID, and it contains an array of user IDs representing users who have sent a follow request.
      • requestedBy: Stores the follow requests made by the current user. The document ID is the current user's ID, and it contains an array of user IDs representing users they have requested to follow.

      Data is written using a Firestore batch operation to ensure atomicity.

      Parameters:
      currUserID - The ID of the current user sending the follow request.
      requestedID - The ID of the user receiving the follow request.

    • getAllRequests

      public void getAllRequests(String userID, FirebaseDB.OnUsersRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves all follow requests for a given user.

      This method fetches the list of user IDs who have sent a follow request to the specified user from the "requests" collection in Firestore. If there are requesters, their user details are retrieved using fetchUsersFromUid(List, OnUsersRetrievedListener).

      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose follow requests are being retrieved.
      listener - A callback interface OnUsersRetrievedListener that receives the list of users who have sent follow requests.

    • getAllRequestIds

      public void getAllRequestIds(String userID, FirebaseDB.OnUserIdsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves all follow request IDs for a given user.

      This method fetches the list of user IDs who have sent a follow request to the specified user from the "requests" collection in Firestore. The retrieved user IDs are then passed to the provided OnUserIdsRetrievedListener callback.

      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose follow request IDs are being retrieved.
      listener - A callback interface OnUserIdsRetrievedListener that receives the list of user IDs who have sent follow requests.

    • getAllRequestedIds

      public void getAllRequestedIds(String userID, FirebaseDB.OnUserIdsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves the userids of all the users that the current user has requested to follow
      Parameters:
      userID -
      listener -

    • getAllFollowingIds

      public void getAllFollowingIds(String userID, FirebaseDB.OnUserIdsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a list of the ids of all users that a user is following
      Parameters:
      userID -
      listener -

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest(String currUserID, String requesterID)
      Accepts a follow request from a requester and updates Firestore accordingly.

      This method performs the following operations using a Firestore batch write:

      • Adds the requester as a follower of the current user by calling addFollower(WriteBatch, String, String).
      • Removes the requester ID from the "requesters" array in the "requests" collection.
      Parameters:
      currUserID - The ID of the current user accepting the follow request.
      requesterID - The ID of the user whose follow request is being accepted.

    • removeRequest

      public void removeRequest(String currUserID, String requesterID)
      Removes a follow request from the current user's request list.

      This method updates the "requests" collection in Firestore by removing the requester ID from the "requesters" array of the specified user.

      Parameters:
      currUserID - The ID of the current user rejecting the follow request.
      requesterID - The ID of the user whose follow request is being removed.

    • removeFollowing

      public void removeFollowing(String followerId, String followeeId)
      Removes a user form the current user's following list
      Parameters:
      followerId -
      followeeId -

    • getFollowing

      public void getFollowing(String currUserID, FirebaseDB.OnUsersRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a list of users that the current user is following.

      This method fetches the list of user IDs that the specified user is following from the "follows" collection in Firestore. If the current user is following any users, their details are retrieved using fetchUsersFromUid(List, OnUsersRetrievedListener).

      Parameters:
      currUserID - The ID of the user whose following list is being retrieved.
      listener - A callback interface OnUsersRetrievedListener that receives the list of users the current user is following.

    • getUserMoods

      public void getUserMoods(String uid, FirebaseDB.OnMoodLoadedListener listener)
      Interface only for retrieving IDs
